data.title: Cannabis Advisory Committee Meeting in Los Angeles
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) today announced that the Cannabis Advisory Committee will hold its next meeting on Thursday, March 15, in Los Angeles. The Meeting Notice and Agenda can be found here. Meeting materials will also be posted on the Bureau’s website as they become available. CANNABIS ADVISORY COMMITTEE MEETING WHERE: Millennium […]
